avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: Select your avatar by clicking on the avatar circle.
avatar.hint: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
avatar.ariaLabel: Select an image to use as your avatar

errors.large: Your image is too large (the limit is 2 megabytes)!
errors.uploadFailed: Image upload failed, please try again!

username.title: Username
username.description: This is how people will recognize you.
username.hint: Please use {{usernameValidationRules.maxLength}} characters at maximum. You will be logged out after changing your username.

email.title: Email
email.hint: You will be logged out after the change.

defaultShipmentAddress.title: Default shipment address
defaultShipmentAddress.description: Enter the default shipment address that will get pre-filled.
defaultShipmentAddress.hint: You can always change the address per purchase in the checkout section.

defaultCurrency.title: Default currency
defaultCurrency.hint: Changing the currency does not affect the price. The new rates will be applied. You will be logged out after changing your default currency.

deleteAccount.title: Delete your account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently remove your Cardflow account. Please proceed with caution, this action is irreversible.
